text: Apani bale dinah ami ki allaha byatita-yini nabhomandala o bhumandalera srasta ebam yini saba'ike aharya danakarena o tamke ke'u aharya dana kare na aparake sahayyakari sthira karaba? Apani bale dinah ami adista hayechi ye, sarbagre ami'i ajnabaha haba. Apani kadaca ansibadidera antarbhukta habena na.
